constituent: erection, bishop, cross, ten, needle, crown, child, power, muscle, arnold
heisigStory: If you think of the ten as a little "cross" sitting atop the root of a house where we are used to seeing the "chimney" (drop), then you have the image of a chapel. (This combination will appear once more in this book: Frame 1465.) To complete the picture for uprising, add: child . . . muscles.
koohiiStory1: An erection can shoot like a needle from its crown and has the power to make a child.
koohiiStory2: The erection is the crowned needle that´s got the power to make children.
myStory: đột nhiên, bất ngờ. chữ Bột. lực bột. bột phát.
